title: BEST DEAL BY FAR--GREAT LOCTION--LUXURY BUILDING--
posting_body: ['BEST DEAL BY FAR--GREAT LOCTION--LUXURY BUILDING--', 'Listing ID #: 212927', 'Price: $3,149', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Apartment Amenities', 'City View', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite Kitchen', 'High Ceilings', 'Marble Bath', 'Renovated', 'AMAZING OPPORTUNITY -flex one bedrooms apartment comes with fresh bamboo floors, handsome stone countertops, and bathrooms dressed in fine Italian tile and marble.', 'BUILDING AMENITIES 24-hour doorman, live-in resident manager, and on-site valet service.', 'Thoughtfully planned social spaces make the entire building feel like home.', 'Relax on the outdoor landscaped terrace, meet up with friends in the residents lounge, or host an intimate dinner in the private dining room with chef’s kitchen.', 'When it’s time to break a sweat, head Battery Park City as great local schools, safe streets and parks galore, is an ideal neighborhood to raise children.', 'Residents stay active.', 'Much of the social life takes place on the water, where you can catch Manhattan Yacht Club sailboats zipping by during races.', 'What the neighborhood lacks in character, it makes up for in quality of life.', 'The newly expanded Brookfields Place is a hub for restaurants, shopping,Steps away from Financial District and South See Sea Port the fully equipped fitness center.', 'Keep your wheels close with the bicycle room and on-site attended garage.', "'BETTER CALL MARCO' TO SCHEDULE A PRIVATE VIEWING OF THIS AMAZING OPPORTUNITY MOBILE-(917)353-3448 EMAIL", '<URL> TEXT FOR FASTER RESPONSE', 'Marco Bianchi', 'Phone: 9173533448', 'Mobile: 9173533448', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Marco Bianchi at 9173533448']
